summary: This mod will add and let you craft 2 potions and 3 pieces of jewelry to the game, giving protection.
descriptionHtml:
Ratnip's Crafting for the Khajiit in you.

This mod will let you craft 2 potions; Waterbreathing and Fortify Barter.
      Once you have your ingredients, find a Cooking pot make something yummy.
      I know Khajiits don't like water, but sometimes you must go where you don't want to go.
      Though Khajiits are skilled merchants, sometimes you run into a crafty cat who is hard to talk to.

It will also let you forge 3 items; circlet of Life, necklace of Life and ring of Life.
      These are very handy for the sneaky cat that wants to survive and make his fortune in Skyrim.
      The crafting of these items can be done as soon as you gather all your ingredients and bring them
      to a forge.

P.S. Please see Change log and Articles for  more information!
author: Ratnip

files.name: Ratnip's Crafting
files.changelogHtml:
Added creatable water breathing potion
Added creatable Barter potion
Add Ring of Life
Added Necklace of Life
Added Circlet of Life

files.name: Ranip's Crafting
files.changelogHtml: Fixed missing property of crafted jewelery
